==Japanese==
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=こきぶり'}}

===Etymology===
The reading comes from {{furigana|御器被り|ごきかぶり}}, which came from {{furigana|御器|ごき}} "dish" + {{furigana|被り|かぶり}} "biting". Up until the Meiji era, this used to be the word for "cockroach". Due to typographical errors, the か became omitted. The original form still exists today in certain dialects, and furthermore there are variations of it across dialects as well.{{rfv-etymology|lang=ja}}
